name: The Powerpuff Girls: Bad Mojo Jojo
description: Mojo Jojo has broken into Professor Utonium's lab, and built some superweapons with which he will destroy Townsville. Help Blossom lead her sisters and use her perfect combination of Brains, Beauty and Braun to track down and defeat the evil genius, Mojo Jojo, and thus save the citizens of Townsville!
